trans-unit.source: System Requirements
trans-unit.target: System Requirements

trans-unit.source: Install the latest Windows updates before installing WMF 5.0 RTM.
trans-unit.target: Install the latest Windows updates before installing WMF 5.0 RTM.

trans-unit.source: You can install WMF 5.0 RTM only on the following operating systems:
trans-unit.target: You can install WMF 5.0 RTM only on the following operating systems:

trans-unit.source: | Operating System | Editions | Prerequisites | Package Links |
trans-unit.target: | Operating System | Editions | Prerequisites | Package Links |

trans-unit.source: | Windows Server 2012 R2 | | | [Win8.1AndW2K12R2-KB3134758-x64.msu](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=717507) |
trans-unit.target: | Windows Server 2012 R2 | | | [Win8.1AndW2K12R2-KB3134758-x64.msu](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=717507) |

trans-unit.source: | Windows Server 2012 | | | [W2K12-KB3134759-x64.msu](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=717506) |
trans-unit.target: | Windows Server 2012 | | | [W2K12-KB3134759-x64.msu](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=717506) |

trans-unit.source: | Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1 | All, except IA64 | [WMF 4.0](http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=40855) and [.NET Framework 4.5 or above](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/5a4x27ek.aspx) are installed| [Win7AndW2K8R2-KB3134760-x64.msu](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=717504)|
trans-unit.target: | Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1 | All, except IA64 | [WMF 4.0](http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=40855) and [.NET Framework 4.5 or above](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/5a4x27ek.aspx) are installed| [Win7AndW2K8R2-KB3134760-x64.msu](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=717504)|

trans-unit.source: | Windows 8.1 | Pro, Enterprise | | **x64:** [Win8.1AndW2K12R2-KB3134758-x64.msu](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=717507)
trans-unit.target: | Windows 8.1 | Pro, Enterprise | | **x64:** [Win8.1AndW2K12R2-KB3134758-x64.msu](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=717507)

trans-unit.source: **x86:** [Win8.1-KB3134758-x86.msu](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=717963)|
trans-unit.target: **x86:** [Win8.1-KB3134758-x86.msu](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=717963)|

trans-unit.source: | Windows 7 SP1 | All | [WMF 4.0](http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=40855) and [.NET Framework 4.5 or above](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/5a4x27ek.aspx) are installed | **x64:** [Win7AndW2K8R2-KB3134760-x64.msu](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=717504)
trans-unit.target: | Windows 7 SP1 | All | [WMF 4.0](http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=40855) and [.NET Framework 4.5 or above](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/5a4x27ek.aspx) are installed | **x64:** [Win7AndW2K8R2-KB3134760-x64.msu](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=717504)

trans-unit.target: **x86:** [Win7-KB3134760-x86.msu](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=717962)|

trans-unit.source: Installation Instructions
trans-unit.target: Installation Instructions

trans-unit.source: To install WMF 5.0 from Windows Explorer (or File Explorer):
trans-unit.target: To install WMF 5.0 from Windows Explorer (or File Explorer):

trans-unit.source: Navigate to the folder into which you downloaded the MSU file.
trans-unit.target: Navigate to the folder into which you downloaded the MSU file.

trans-unit.source: Double-click the MSU to run it.
trans-unit.target: Double-click the MSU to run it.

trans-unit.source: To install WMF 5.0 from Command Prompt:
trans-unit.target: To install WMF 5.0 from Command Prompt:

trans-unit.source: After downloading the correct package for your computer's architecture, open a Command Prompt window with elevated user rights (Run as Administrator).
trans-unit.target: After downloading the correct package for your computer's architecture, open a Command Prompt window with elevated user rights (Run as Administrator).

trans-unit.source: On the Server Core installation options of Windows Server 2012 R2 or Windows Server 2012 or Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1, Command Prompt opens with elevated user rights by default.
trans-unit.target: On the Server Core installation options of Windows Server 2012 R2 or Windows Server 2012 or Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1, Command Prompt opens with elevated user rights by default.

trans-unit.source: Change directories to the folder into which you have downloaded or copied the WMF 5.0 installation package.
trans-unit.target: Change directories to the folder into which you have downloaded or copied the WMF 5.0 installation package.

trans-unit.source: Run one of the following commands:
trans-unit.target: Run one of the following commands:

trans-unit.source: On computers that are running Windows Server 2012 R2 or Windows 8.1 x64, run **Win8.1AndW2K12R2-KB3134758-x64.msu /quiet**.
trans-unit.target: On computers that are running Windows Server 2012 R2 or Windows 8.1 x64, run **Win8.1AndW2K12R2-KB3134758-x64.msu /quiet**.

trans-unit.source: On computers that are running Windows Server 2012, run **W2K12-KB3134759-x64.msu /quiet**.
trans-unit.target: On computers that are running Windows Server 2012, run **W2K12-KB3134759-x64.msu /quiet**.

trans-unit.source: On computers that are running Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1 or Windows 7 SP1 x64, run **Win7AndW2K8R2-KB3134760-x64.msu /quiet**.
trans-unit.target: On computers that are running Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1 or Windows 7 SP1 x64, run **Win7AndW2K8R2-KB3134760-x64.msu /quiet**.

trans-unit.source: On computers that are running Windows 8.1 x86, run **Win8.1-KB3134758-x86.msu /quiet**.
trans-unit.target: On computers that are running Windows 8.1 x86, run **Win8.1-KB3134758-x86.msu /quiet**.

trans-unit.source: On computers that are running Windows 7 SP1 x86, run **Win7-KB3134760-x86.msu /quiet**.
trans-unit.target: On computers that are running Windows 7 SP1 x86, run **Win7-KB3134760-x86.msu /quiet**.

trans-unit.source: Additional Installation Notes for Windows Server 2008 SP1 and Windows 7 SP1:
trans-unit.target: Additional Installation Notes for Windows Server 2008 SP1 and Windows 7 SP1:

trans-unit.source: Ensure following prerequisites have been met:
trans-unit.target: Ensure following prerequisites have been met:

trans-unit.source: Latest service pack is installed.
trans-unit.target: Latest service pack is installed.

trans-unit.source: [WMF 4.0](http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=40855) is installed.
trans-unit.target: [WMF 4.0](http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=40855) is installed.

trans-unit.source: [.NET Framework 4.5 or above](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/5a4x27ek.aspx) is installed.
trans-unit.target: [.NET Framework 4.5 or above](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/5a4x27ek.aspx) is installed.

trans-unit.source: *WinRM Dependency:*
trans-unit.target: *WinRM Dependency:*

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell Desired State Configuration (DSC) depends on WinRM.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell Desired State Configuration (DSC) depends on WinRM.

trans-unit.source: WinRM is not enabled by default on Windows Server 2008 R2 and Windows 7.
trans-unit.target: WinRM is not enabled by default on Windows Server 2008 R2 and Windows 7.

trans-unit.source: To enable WinRM, in a Windows PowerShell elevated session, run **Set-WSManQuickConfig**.
trans-unit.target: To enable WinRM, in a Windows PowerShell elevated session, run **Set-WSManQuickConfig**.

trans-unit.source: Uninstallation Instructions
trans-unit.target: Uninstallation Instructions

trans-unit.source: Using Command Prompt
trans-unit.target: Using Command Prompt

trans-unit.source: Open **Command Prompt.**
trans-unit.target: Open **Command Prompt.**

trans-unit.source: Run the [Windows Update Standalone Launcher](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/kb/934307) as shown below:
trans-unit.target: Run the [Windows Update Standalone Launcher](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/kb/934307) as shown below:

trans-unit.source: On Windows Server 2012 R2 and Windows 8.1:
trans-unit.target: On Windows Server 2012 R2 and Windows 8.1:

trans-unit.source: On Windows Server 2012:
trans-unit.target: On Windows Server 2012:

trans-unit.source: On Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1 and Windows 7 SP1:
trans-unit.target: On Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1 and Windows 7 SP1:

trans-unit.source: Using Control Panel
trans-unit.target: Using Control Panel

trans-unit.source: Open **Control Panel.**
trans-unit.target: Open **Control Panel.**

trans-unit.source: Open **Programs**, then open **Uninstall a program.**
trans-unit.target: Open **Programs**, then open **Uninstall a program.**

trans-unit.source: Click **View installed updates.**
trans-unit.target: Click **View installed updates.**

trans-unit.source: Select **Windows Management Framework 5.0** from the list of installed updates.
trans-unit.target: Select **Windows Management Framework 5.0** from the list of installed updates.

trans-unit.source: This corresponds to *KB3134758*, *KB3134759*, or *KB3134760*.
trans-unit.target: This corresponds to *KB3134758*, *KB3134759*, or *KB3134760*.

trans-unit.source: Click **Uninstall.**
trans-unit.target: Click **Uninstall.**
